news.title: There’s an app for that: finding a sunny cafe in Paris, the city of light
news.summary: Jveuxdusoleil (I want sun) taps into a key part of Parisian culture: drinks on the terrasse. The app tracks the sun’s movement through the city to pinpoint exactly where you can claim a sunny spot for your coffee.

news.title: Australian livestreaming platform Kick broadcast a man’s death – could it face repercussions from regulators?
news.summary: Man in France died during a live stream on Kick, an online gaming platform. The death has sparked a police investigation and calls for regulators to examine what happened and how it was allowed to be beamed out live.

news.title: Angela Rayner hit with legal challenge over datacentre on green belt land
news.summary: Angela Rayner overruled a local council to approve a hyperscale datacentre in Buckinghamshire. Campaigners complain no environmental impact assessment was made for the 90MW facility.

news.title: All Will Rise, the game empowering players to tackle real-world problems
news.summary: All Will Rise is a card game about activism. The game is designed to inspire players to engage with issues such as pollution and the climate crisis.
